sentences.sContent: But how can we find it in the busy daily life?
sentences.sContent_eng: But how can we find it in the busy daily life?
sentences.sCn: 但我们要怎样在忙碌的日常生活中得到它呢？

sentences.sContent: I volunteer because it takes me out of my daily life.
sentences.sContent_eng: I volunteer because it takes me out of my daily life.
sentences.sCn: 我去做志愿者是因为它能让我从日常生活中抽身而出。

sentences.sContent: Atomic energy has been discovered for many years, but so far it has not been widely used in industry or in our daily life.
sentences.sContent_eng: Atomic energy has been discovered for many years, but so far it has not been widely used in industry or in our daily life.
sentences.sCn: 原子能已发现多年， 但至今仍未广泛用于工业或日常生活方面。
